code: @Manual{,   title = {AHPGaussian: New Multicriteria Method: AHPGaussian},   author = {Cid Edson Povoas and Marcos {dos Santos}},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.1.3},   url = {https://cidedson.github.io/ahpgaussian/}, }

title: AHPGaussian
text: AHPGaussian package provides functions performing Analytic Hierarchy Process (AHP) using Gaussian-based approach. AHP widely used decision-making method helps prioritize alternatives based set criteria. package implements AHP method using Gaussian normalization derive relative weights criteria alternatives. also includes functions visualizing AHP results generating graphical outputs.

title: Decision Matrix — cellphones
text: example data.frame cellphone model characteristics

title: Decision Matrix — cellphones
text: format :        'data.frame':	5 obs.  5 variables:     $ criteria: chr  "Price" "Camera" "Storage" "Battery Life" ...     $ Xiaomi  : int  1500 12 64 24 94     $ Samsung : int  1800 12 128 18 120     $ iPhone  : int  5000 20 128 10 117     $ min_max : chr  "min" "max" "max" "max" ...     # Description     #     criteria: Statement goal, decision criteria alternatives.     Xiaomi: Xiaomi model;     Samsung: Samsung model;     iPhone: iPhone model.     min_max: Weights criteria alternatives.

title: Decision Matrix — cellphones
code: data(cellphones) cellphones #>       criteria Xiaomi Samsung iPhone min_max #> 1        Price   1500    1800   5000     min #> 2       Camera     12      12     20     max #> 3      Storage     64     128    128     max #> 4 Battery Life     24      18     10     max #> 5       Weight     94     120    117     min

Decision Matrix — warships
text: data.frame Decision Matrix data used Santos (2021), first column lists criteria, next three columns represent alternatives last column represents objective choice minimum maximum given criterion. model corresponds alternative ship, classified according respective criteria.

title: Decision Matrix — warships
text: dos Santos, M, Costa, . P. de ., & Gomes, C. F. S. (2021)   Multicriteria decision-making selection warships: new approach ahp method. International Journal Analytic Hierarchy Process, 13(1).   <doi:10.13033/ijahp.v13i1.833>.

title: Decision Matrix — warships
text: format :        'data.frame':	9 obs.  5 variables:     criteria: chr  "Action Radius" "Fuel Endurance" "Autonomy" "Primary Cannon" ...     model_1 : num  4000 11 30 25 1 0 290 592 6     model_2 : num  9330 26 25 25 2 1 310 633 8     model_3 : num  10660 30 35 120 2 ...     min_max : chr  "max" "max" "max" "max" ...     #     # Description     #     criteria: Statement goal, decision criteria alternatives.     model_1: Replicate current Corvette Barroso;     model_2: Build slightly modernized ship (2.600 ton corvette);     model_3: Build model significant modernizations (3.000 ton corvette).     min_max: Weights criteria alternatives.

title: Decision Matrix — warships
code: data(warships) warships #>            criteria model_1 model_2 model_3 min_max #> 1     Action Radius    4000    9330   10660     max #> 2    Fuel Endurance      11      26      30     max #> 3          Autonomy      30      25      35     max #> 4    Primary Cannon      25      25     120     max #> 5  Secondary Cannon       1       2       2     max #> 6      AAW Missiles       0       1       1     max #> 7      Initial Cost     290     310     310     min #> 8   Life Cycle Cost     592     633     633     min #> 9 Construction Time       6       8       8     min
